Text: This is not English (NOT). Sounds like pure Portuguese language. A8/V8.

Correction. You can switch languages in your Media Player. IE, KmPlayer has a button called "Mp3 streams". It allows you to switch to different languages that's prebuilt into the movie. This movie uses Portugese (by default) but can be switched to English. 

Audio(8.0)/Video(7.9).
